scripts.build: pnpm -C packages/nextclaw-core build && pnpm -C packages/extensions/nextclaw-channel-runtime build && pnpm -C packages/nextclaw-openclaw-compat build && pnpm -C packages/nextclaw-server build && pnpm -C packages/nextclaw-ui build && pnpm -C packages/nextclaw build
scripts.lint: pnpm -C packages/nextclaw-core lint && pnpm -C packages/extensions/nextclaw-channel-runtime lint && pnpm -C packages/nextclaw-openclaw-compat lint && pnpm -C packages/nextclaw-server lint && pnpm -C packages/nextclaw lint
scripts.tsc: pnpm -C packages/nextclaw-core tsc && pnpm -C packages/extensions/nextclaw-channel-runtime tsc && pnpm -C packages/nextclaw-openclaw-compat tsc && pnpm -C packages/nextclaw-server tsc && pnpm -C packages/nextclaw tsc
scripts.release:check: pnpm build && pnpm lint && pnpm tsc
scripts.release:publish: pnpm release:check && pnpm changeset publish && pnpm changeset tag
scripts.deploy:pages: pnpm --filter @nextclaw/landing build && npx wrangler pages deploy packages/landing/dist --project-name nextclaw-landing --branch master
